name: Just A Red Square
description:
Just a red square trying to get home

Play through 25 easy and hard levels 

Avoid all circles if you touch a circle you die

This is a self 24 hour game jam all the work was done for fun no competition!

controls:

WASD - Movement

(Yes that's all)

If you would like a downloadable version please let me know!

Music: 

 Extreme Trap Racing Music | Power by Alex-Productions | https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx0_M61F81Nfb-BRXE-SeVA
